name: Memoir
detailed_description:
Explore a mythical ancient castle and solve puzzles to unfold the secrets of a deer people civilization.

Memoir is a puzzle game that reveals a story of a mythical ancient castle as you solve along. Guide the little deer kin as she wakes up at the entrance of a mythical ancient castle without memories.

  • Classic push the block puzzles with a twist
  • Merge and eliminate blocks by merging them together to fit what the puzzle needs
  • Featuring more than 60+ puzzle levels
  • 6 beautifully hand drawn ruins of a deer people civilization in different themes to explore

short_description: Explore the ruins of an ancient castle and solve puzzles to guide a little deer kin through the areas.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Window 7
  • Processor: multi-core processor with 2Ghz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX660 or Equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Standard Audio
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 2.5 Ghz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX970 or Equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Standard Audio

  • Sound Card: Standard Audio
